attributes.title: Can You Survive Elden Ring?
attributes.caption: The Recreyo crew are in the world of Elden Ring!
attributes.description:
Come hang with us at RTX in Austin Texas! We have a panel July 2nd! 

Tickets and more info can be found here!: https://bit.ly/Recreyo

(plus using this link to buy your tickets supports us!)

ALSO July 30th we'll be hosting a LIVE SCENARIO in New York City, along with the Off Topic Podcast who will also have a live recording!

Tickets and more info can be found here: https://bit.ly/tix-nyc   


The Recreyo crew are in the world of Elden Ring!
